issue.title: [CF 1009] checking unit compared to other units
issue.body:
Hello, I'm sorry if this is already doable, or impossible to do but here is what i'd like to do:

Checking if my mouseover target is also my current target.
This would be a big help for the monks Storm,Earth and Fire ability.


> Posted by CurseForge user feherandor | Imported from CurseForge issue #1009 | Raw

comments.body:
Use the Unit Is Unit condition.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

it was the scrollbar ... i didn't notice it becouse of the scrollbar . :) thank you, and thank you for this awsome addon.


> Posted by CurseForge user feherandor
